title: Data-Driven Interactive E-Book Learning Design Process

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in digital learning tools and fundamental knowledge of language learning
context.additional_context: Language learning programs for professionals in healthcare/legal/technical fields. Conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments. Enhanced data-driven design through learning analytics dashboards and interactive e-books.

learning_goals: Learners can interpret user behavior patterns with 80% accuracy using data analysis tools in interactive e-books
Learners can submit design proposals to optimize e-book content structures at least three times based on analysis results
Learners can identify two or more high-impact interaction elements for language learning effectiveness by comparing A/B test results

resources: Interactive template set for language learning
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
